title: Virginia's digital crossroads: Spread of AI relies on data center expansion

content:

title: Trump and Starmer sign tech deal to mark ‘new era’ for UK-US relationship
description: Donald Trump said a new tech deal would help the US and UK “dominate” in the world of artificial intelligence (AI) as Sir Keir Starmer hailed a “new era” for the special relationship.

title: Advanced AI links atomic structure to quantum tech
description: A research team led by Oak Ridge National Laboratory has developed a new method to uncover the atomic origins of unusual material behavior. This approach uses Bayesian deep learning, a form of artificial intelligence that combines probability theory and neural networks to analyze complex datasets with exceptional efficiency.
